results in.from sentence: We notice that reattention has more influences on EM score while DCRL contributes more to F1 metric , and removing both of them results in huge drops on both metrics .

DCRL.from sentence: Replacing DCRL with SCST also causes a marginal decline of performance on both metrics .

default attention function.with: dot product : f ( u , v ) = u v ( 5 )
default attention function.from sentence: Next , we relace the default attention function with the dot product : f ( u , v ) = u v ( 5 ) , and both metrics suffer from degradations .

any of the two heuristics.from sentence: Removing any of the two heuristics leads to some performance declines , and heuristic subtraction is more effective than multiplication .

highway - like function.from sentence: In both cases the highway - like function has outperformed its simpler variants .

very deep alignment.from sentence: Interestingly , a very deep alignment with 5 blocks results in a significant performance decline .

increasing to.from sentence: We notice that using 2 blocks causes a slight performance drop , while increasing to 4 blocks barely affects the SoTA result .
